## Creating vectors in R
 
This is how you create a vector in r:

```{r creating vectors}
x <- c(2,4,5,6)
x
```

## Adding vectors together
To add vectors together we can do the following:

```{r adding vectors}
y <- c(1,2,3,4)
z <- x+y
z

```
